name: esapiEncode
description: Warning: esapiEncode() is deprecated, use encodeForHTML() instead! A Railo/Lucee specific function for calling the various encodeFor functions: encodeForHTML, etc. Not supported in ACF.

params.name: encodeFor
params.description: Required. Encode for what, valid values are: - css: for output inside Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) - dn: for output in LDAP Distinguished Names - html: for output inside HTML - html_attr: for output inside HTML Attributes - javascript: for output inside Javascript - ldap: for output in LDAP queries - url: for output in URL - vbscript: for output inside vbscript - xml: for output inside XML - xml_attr: for output inside XML Attributes - xpath: for output in XPath.
